body.name: Nightstand with Charging Station,Bedside Table with Drawer and 2 Shelf Storage, Small Side Table, Modern White Night Stand, Tall End Table for Bedroom, Living Room
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 4 mins
features: Modern White Bedside Table: The white and gold color combination and eye-catching appearance make it a uniquely designed nightstand, suitable for various styles of home decoration, accompanying you every fresh morning.

Large Storage Space: Measuring 11.81"d x 16.54"w x 23.62"h, this coffee table's compact size and large storage space make the small nights tand perfect for small spaces. The height of this nightstand is 23.62"h, making it suitable for placing in your bedside, sofa side, and suitable for bedrooms, living rooms and desks.

Bedside Charging Helper: This nightstand has built in 2 AC outlets and 2 USB ports. Whether it is by the bed or the sofa, you can enjoy the fun of timely and rapid charging without worrying about insufficient power and cluttered wires, fully meeting your charging needs.

Multi-Scenario Use: This side table has a drawer and two open shelves. Anti-drop bezel design provides perfect storage space for your desk lamp, remote control and mobile phone. Imagine relaxing next to this stylish piece of furniture while enjoying a cup of coffee. Modern design, the best gift for friends and family.

High Quality Material, Sturdy and Stable：The end table is made of high quality MDF board with gold iron frame. Strong and durable. The bottom has adjustable feet, which not only can be placed stably on the floor, but also prevent scratches on the floor and reduce noise when moving.

Easy to Assemble: The wooden nightstand comes with detailed instructions and all necessary parts in the package. You can easily install this Nightstand, and quickly clean and use. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions on Nightstand. We will respond quickly within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oiiokuku Nightstands with Charging Station and USB Ports for Living Room The combination of rustic wooden boards and elegant black frames, placed beside the bed, beautiful vases or photo frames, the whole bedroom is full of warm atmosphere. This bedside table comes with a charging station and USB port so you can turn over in bed to charge your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent night stand
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were easy and it was easy to put together. The only issue I had are pictured. The first 2 steps, the plastic piece to hold the drawer in was not like pictures in the instructions. It sat over the holes which required me to unscrew them and do step 2 before 1. Luckily it is the first steps, otherwise no issues.Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were clear and it was easy to put together. Looks great! Super sturdy, love the drawer for storing things. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice product, easy to assemble. It worths its price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buy something else
reviews.reviewText: Horrible to assemble. You’re gonna hate it. Too small. It’s dinky light short cheap. Feels cheap. One leg is longer than the other so it wobbles. Says it has adjustable feet but it doesn’t. You’re gonna hate it. I promise. Buy something else. Anything else. No way it could be worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and overall excellent product
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product because I’m refurnishing my apartment and this table fits my industrial style theme. Assembling furniture is my favorite de-stressing activity ever. Nothing dampers that bliss more than unclear instructions and pieces that just don’t fit well together. Thankfully this product had perhaps the clearest instructions I’ve ever followed for assembling furniture. AND the pieces fit together seamlessly. Assembly was a breeze. The finished product was impressive also. It’s a very cute and functional table. I love the built-in outlet and usb ports. That trend in furniture features is awesome. I would have liked to see a type c port as well but hey, not all products can be perfect. However, this one comes pretty close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was sooooooo easy to assemble and was a perfect fit for my needs. A sturdy table that suits a variety of styles and has a charging station which has come in super handy when devices die and it’s the end of the world for children anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Nightstand with a Charging Station
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this nightstand, and it has a lot of positive features. Firstly, it's a very nice piece of furniture with a sturdy build and an attractive color contrast in the wood veneer. Putting it together was a breeze, thanks to the clear and easy-to-follow instructions. Although it's a bit on the small side, I've found it versatile enough to use both as a nightstand in my bedroom and as an end table in the living room.What makes this nightstand stand out is the thoughtful design. All the components are made of durable materials, with a metal frame and a robust wood composite for the drawer and shelf. The rustic finish adds a nice touch, and the surface is easy to clean and resistant to scratches. A significant advantage is the built-in charging station, which keeps all your device cords neatly organized and out of the way. Considering the quality and functionality, I believe this nightstand offers excellent value for its price, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a versatile and well-designed piece of furniture.
